title: Tokyo Explorer's Delight
highlights: Experience the perfect blend of traditional and modern Japan in this 5-day Tokyo adventure. From ancient temples to cutting-edge technology, immerse yourself in the vibrant culture of Japan's capital.

days.subtitle: Arrival and Shinjuku
days.recommendation: Arrive in Tokyo and explore the vibrant Shinjuku district. Visit the Tokyo Metropolitan Government Building for panoramic views and experience the famous Robot Restaurant show.

days.subtitle: Traditional Tokyo
days.recommendation: Discover the traditional side of Tokyo with visits to ancient temples and shrines. Morning visit to Senso-ji Temple, explore Asakusa district, lunch at a traditional ramen shop, evening at Tokyo Skytree.

title: Parisian Romance
highlights: Fall in love with the City of Light through this romantic 4-day journey. From iconic landmarks to hidden cafes, experience the magic of Paris.

days.subtitle: Classic Paris
days.recommendation: Begin your Parisian adventure with the city's most iconic landmarks. Eiffel Tower visit, Seine River cruise, lunch at a traditional bistro, evening at Montmartre.

title: Bali Wellness Retreat
highlights: Reconnect with nature and yourself in this 7-day wellness retreat in the heart of Bali. Experience yoga, meditation, and traditional Balinese healing practices.

days.subtitle: Arrival and Orientation
days.recommendation: Begin your wellness journey with a traditional welcome ceremony and orientation. Airport pickup, welcome ceremony, yoga session, traditional dinner.

title: New York City Explorer
highlights: Experience the energy of the Big Apple in this 5-day adventure. From Broadway shows to world-class museums, discover why NYC is the city that never sleeps.

days.subtitle: Manhattan Highlights
days.recommendation: Start your NYC adventure with the city's most famous landmarks. Central Park morning walk, Metropolitan Museum of Art, Times Square exploration, Broadway show in the evening.

title: Santorini Sunset Experience
highlights: Immerse yourself in the beauty of Santorini with this 4-day island escape. Experience stunning sunsets, ancient ruins, and Mediterranean cuisine.

days.subtitle: Arrival and Oia
days.recommendation: Begin your Santorini adventure in the picturesque town of Oia. Airport transfer, Oia village exploration, sunset viewing, traditional Greek dinner.

title: Swiss Alps Adventure
highlights: Experience the majesty of the Swiss Alps in this 6-day adventure. From hiking to paragliding, discover the thrill of mountain activities.

days.subtitle: Arrival and Orientation
days.recommendation: Begin your alpine adventure with an orientation and easy hike. Airport transfer, equipment fitting, easy mountain hike, welcome dinner.

title: Bangkok Street Food Tour
highlights: Discover the vibrant street food scene of Bangkok in this 4-day culinary adventure. From night markets to cooking classes, experience authentic Thai cuisine.

days.subtitle: Old Bangkok
days.recommendation: Start your food journey in Bangkok's historic district. Morning market visit, cooking class, temple visits, night market food tour.

title: Costa Rica Eco Adventure
highlights: Experience the natural wonders of Costa Rica in this 7-day eco-adventure. From rainforests to beaches, discover the country's rich biodiversity.

days.subtitle: Arrival and Beach
days.recommendation: Begin your eco-adventure with a beach day and orientation. Airport transfer, beach time, wildlife watching, welcome dinner.

title: Venice Cultural Journey
highlights: Experience the magic of Venice in this 4-day cultural journey. From gondola rides to art museums, discover the city's rich heritage.

days.subtitle: Classic Venice
days.recommendation: Begin your Venetian adventure with the city's most famous landmarks. St. Mark's Basilica, Doge's Palace, gondola ride, traditional dinner.

title: Dubai Luxury Experience
highlights: Experience the luxury and excitement of Dubai in this 5-day adventure. From desert safaris to world-class shopping, discover the city's modern wonders.

days.subtitle: Modern Dubai
days.recommendation: Begin your Dubai adventure with the city's iconic landmarks. Burj Khalifa visit, Dubai Mall shopping, desert safari, traditional dinner.

title: Kyoto Cultural Immersion
highlights: Immerse yourself in traditional Japanese culture in this 5-day Kyoto journey. From tea ceremonies to temple visits, experience the heart of Japan.

days.subtitle: Traditional Kyoto
days.recommendation: Begin your cultural journey with Kyoto's most famous temples. Kinkaku-ji visit, tea ceremony, traditional lunch, evening in Gion.

title: Barcelona Art & Architecture
highlights: Discover the artistic and architectural wonders of Barcelona in this 4-day journey. From Gaudi's masterpieces to vibrant markets, experience the city's creative spirit.

days.subtitle: Gaudi's Barcelona
days.recommendation: Begin your artistic journey with Gaudi's most famous works. Sagrada Familia visit, Park GÃ¼ell exploration, La Boqueria market, evening tapas tour.

title: Cape Town Adventure
highlights: Experience the natural beauty and adventure of Cape Town in this 6-day journey. From Table Mountain to wine country, discover South Africa's most vibrant city.

days.subtitle: City Introduction
days.recommendation: Begin your Cape Town adventure with the city's iconic landmarks. Table Mountain hike, V&A Waterfront, Robben Island tour, sunset at Signal Hill.

title: Amsterdam Cultural Tour
highlights: Discover the cultural treasures of Amsterdam in this 4-day journey. From world-class museums to historic canals, experience the city's rich heritage.

days.subtitle: Museum District
days.recommendation: Begin your cultural journey with Amsterdam's famous museums. Rijksmuseum visit, Van Gogh Museum, canal cruise, traditional dinner.

title: Sydney Coastal Adventure
highlights: Experience the best of Sydney in this 5-day coastal adventure. From iconic beaches to the Opera House, discover Australia's most famous city.

days.subtitle: City Highlights
days.recommendation: Begin your Sydney adventure with the city's most famous landmarks. Opera House tour, Harbour Bridge walk, Bondi Beach, evening harbor cruise.

title: Marrakech Cultural Experience
highlights: Immerse yourself in the vibrant culture of Marrakech in this 4-day journey. From bustling souks to traditional riads, experience the magic of Morocco.

days.subtitle: Old Medina
days.recommendation: Begin your Marrakech adventure in the historic medina. Jemaa el-Fnaa visit, souk exploration, traditional lunch, evening market.

title: Vancouver Nature Explorer
highlights: Discover the natural beauty of Vancouver in this 5-day adventure. From mountains to ocean, experience Canada's most livable city.

days.subtitle: City and Nature
days.recommendation: Begin your Vancouver adventure with a mix of urban and natural attractions. Stanley Park, Granville Island, Capilano Suspension Bridge, sunset at English Bay.

title: Seoul Food & Culture Tour
highlights: Experience the vibrant food and culture of Seoul in this 5-day journey. From street food to palaces, discover the heart of South Korea.

days.subtitle: Traditional Seoul
days.recommendation: Begin your Seoul adventure with traditional culture and food. Gyeongbokgung Palace, traditional market visit, Korean cooking class, evening in Myeongdong.

title: Rio de Janeiro Carnival
highlights: Experience the excitement of Rio de Janeiro in this 6-day adventure. From Carnival to beaches, discover the energy of Brazil's most famous city.

days.subtitle: City Introduction
days.recommendation: Begin your Rio adventure with the city's most famous landmarks. Christ the Redeemer, Copacabana Beach, Sugarloaf Mountain, evening samba show.

title: Hawaii Island Hopping
highlights: Discover the beauty of Hawaii in this 7-day island hopping adventure. From volcanoes to beaches, experience the magic of the Pacific islands.

days.subtitle: Oahu Introduction
days.recommendation: Begin your Hawaiian adventure on the island of Oahu. Waikiki Beach, Pearl Harbor visit, Diamond Head hike, traditional luau.

days.subtitle: Island Hopping
days.recommendation: Continue your island adventure exploring different Hawaiian islands. Inter-island flight, volcano exploration, beach activities, farewell dinner.
